ontologies.title: Financial Securities Ontology
ontologies.description: The Financial Securities Ontology provides a structured framework for representing financial securities, including debt securities, documents related to financial reporting, and regulatory filings. It aims to facilitate the organization and retrieval of information related to securities and their issuers, enhancing transparency and accessibility in financial markets.

ontologies.title: French (Supreme) Court of Appeal Ontology
ontologies.description: This ontology represents the legal concepts and relationships relevant to the French Supreme Court of Appeal. It includes classes for convictions, offences, facts, and personal attributes such as marital status and profession. The ontology aims to facilitate the organization and retrieval of legal information in a structured manner.
